languages.text: "Глейто, изготовка". {n}Кибермастиф немедленно принимает стойку, а Соломон начинает указывать на разные части пса.{/n} "Корпус — по большей части из металла, бронепластины закрывают жизненно важные части тела. Челюсть усилена — откусить ногу, что волос выдрать". {n}Он поворачивает морду Глейто, чтобы вам было лучше видно и без того огромные клыки.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Как-то посадить компаньона, типа, к собаке присел и показывает
Собаку встать на все лапы

Как-то посадить компаньона, типа, к собаке присел и показывает
Собаку встать на все лапы

languages.text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

Челюсть усилена — откусить ногу, что волос выдрать". {n}Он поворачивает морду Глейто, чтобы вам было лучше видно и без того огромные клыки.{/n}

languages.text: 「グライト、構えろ」{n}サイバーマスチフはすぐさま立ち上がり、ソロモーンはその体の各部を指し示しながら説明を始めた。{/n}「フレームはほぼ金属製で、要所は装甲板で保護されています。顎部は強化されていて、足の一本を噛み砕くのなんて、あいつにとっては髪の毛を引き抜く程度のことです」{n}彼はグライトの頭部をこちらに向け、牙がよく見えるようにした。まるで、その恐ろしい大きさは肉眼で見ただけでは分からないとでも言いたげだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「グライト、構えろ」{n}サイバーマスチフはすぐさま立ち上がり、ソロモーンはその体の各部を指し示しながら説明を始めた。{/n}「フレームはほぼ金属製で、要所は装甲板で保護されています。顎部は強化されていて、足の一本を噛み砕くのなんて、あいつにとっては髪の毛を引き抜く程度のことです」{n}彼はグライトの頭部をこちらに向け、牙がよく見えるようにした。まるで、その恐ろしい大きさは肉眼で見ただけでは分からないとでも言いたげだった。{/n}

languages.text: "Glaito, Achtung!" {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff steht sofort auf, und Solomorne deutet auf verschiedene Teile des Hundekörpers:{/n} "Der Rumpf besteht hauptsächlich aus Metall, wobei Panzerplatten die lebenswichtigen Bereiche abdecken. Der Kiefer ist verstärkt – ein Bein abzubeißen ist für ihn, als würde er ein Haar ausreißen." {n}Er dreht Glaitos Kopf, damit du seine Zähne besser sehen kannst – als wäre ihre furchterregende Größe nicht bereits deutlich genug erkennbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, Achtung!" {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff steht sofort auf, und Solomorne deutet auf verschiedene Teile des Hundekörpers:{/n} "Der Rumpf besteht hauptsächlich aus Metall, wobei Panzerplatten die lebenswichtigen Bereiche abdecken. Der Kiefer ist verstärkt – ein Bein abzubeißen ist für ihn, als würde er ein Haar ausreißen." {n}Er dreht Glaitos Kopf, damit du seine Zähne besser sehen kannst – als wäre ihre furchterregende Größe nicht bereits deutlich genug erkennbar.{/n}

languages.text: « Glaito, garde à vous. » {n}Le cyber-mastiff se redresse immédiatement et Solomorne commence à vous désigner les différents éléments qui composent le chien :{/n} « La structure est essentiellement métallique, des plaques de blindage couvrent les zones vitales. La mâchoire est renforcée, si bien qu'il peut arracher une jambe entière sans le moindre effort. » {n}Il tourne la tête de Glaito afin de vous permettre d'observer ses crocs de plus près, comme si ses dents immenses n'étaient pas déjà suffisamment visibles depuis une distance respectable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Glaito, garde à vous. » {n}Le cyber-mastiff se redresse immédiatement et Solomorne commence à vous désigner les différents éléments qui composent le chien :{/n} « La structure est essentiellement métallique, des plaques de blindage couvrent les zones vitales. La mâchoire est renforcée, si bien qu'il peut arracher une jambe entière sans le moindre effort. » {n}Il tourne la tête de Glaito afin de vous permettre d'observer ses crocs de plus près, comme si ses dents immenses n'étaient pas déjà suffisamment visibles depuis une distance respectable.{/n}

languages.text: «Atento, Glaito». {n}El cibermastín se pone en pie rápidamente, y Solomorne empieza a señalar las distintas partes que componen el cuerpo del perro:{/n} «La estructura es sobre todo metálica, con placas blindadas que protegen las zonas vitales. La mandíbula está reforzada; podría arrancar una pierna como quien arranca un pelo». {n}Gira la cabeza de Glaito para mostrarte mejor sus colmillos, como si su espantoso tamaño no saltase ya a la vista.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Atento, Glaito». {n}El cibermastín se pone en pie rápidamente, y Solomorne empieza a señalar las distintas partes que componen el cuerpo del perro:{/n} «La estructura es sobre todo metálica, con placas blindadas que protegen las zonas vitales. La mandíbula está reforzada; podría arrancar una pierna como quien arranca un pelo». {n}Gira la cabeza de Glaito para mostrarte mejor sus colmillos, como si su espantoso tamaño no saltase ya a la vista.{/n}

languages.text: “格雷托，站起来。”{n}听到命令，格雷托立刻站了起来。索罗蒙指着它身体的各个部位，向你介绍起来。{/n}“它的骨架绝大部分都是金属制成的，重要部位由装甲板覆盖。它的下颚得到了强化，对它而言，咬断一条腿就像扯断一根头发一样简单。”{n}索罗蒙将格雷托的头转了过来，让你能更清楚看清它的尖牙，就好像你眼前这些硕大、可怕的牙齿还不够吓人一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “格雷托，站起来。”{n}听到命令，格雷托立刻站了起来。索罗蒙指着它身体的各个部位，向你介绍起来。{/n}“它的骨架绝大部分都是金属制成的，重要部位由装甲板覆盖。它的下颚得到了强化，对它而言，咬断一条腿就像扯断一根头发一样简单。”{n}索罗蒙将格雷托的头转了过来，让你能更清楚看清它的尖牙，就好像你眼前这些硕大、可怕的牙齿还不够吓人一样。{/n}

languages.text: "Glaito, hazır." {n}Siber mastif, anında ayağa kalkıyor. Solomorne, köpeğin vücudunun farklı kısımlarını işaret etmeye başlıyor.{/n} "İskeleti büyük oranda metaldir. Hayati kısımları zırhlı plakalarla kaplanmıştır. Takviyeli çenesi, bir bacağı kıl çekermiş gibi kemirerek koparabilir." {n}Sanki muazzam boyutlarının korkunçluğu çıplak gözle belli olmuyormuş gibi Glatio'nun dişlerini daha iyi göstermek için başını tutup çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito, ready." {n}The cyber-mastiff promptly stands up, and Solomorne starts pointing out the different parts of the dog's body:{/n} "The frame is mostly metal, with armoured plates covering the vital segments. The jaw is reinforced — crunching a leg off is like tearing a hair out for him." {n}He turns Glaito's head to give you a better view of the fangs — as if their terrifying size were not apparent to the naked eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glaito, hazır." {n}Siber mastif anında ayağa kalkar ve Solomorne, köpeğin vücudunun farklı kısımlarını işaret etmeye başlar:{/n} "İskeleti büyük oranda metaldir. Hayati kısımları zırhlı plakalarla kaplanmıştır. Takviyeli çenesi, bir bacağı kıl çekermiş gibi kemirerek koparabilir." {n}Glatio'nun dişlerini daha iyi göstermek için başını tutup çeviriyor. Sanki muazzam boyutlarının korkunçluğu çıplak gözle belli olmuyormuş gibi.{/n}
